Package net.sourceforge.plantuml.project.ngm

Class NGMTotalEffort

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.plantuml.project.ngm.NGMTotalEffort
public final class NGMTotalEffort extends Object
Represents the intrinsic amount of work required for a task, expressed internally as seconds of person-time.

This value corresponds to the total workload assuming a single full-time equivalent (1 FTE) resource works on the task. For example:

  • ofHours(1) means 1 hour of work for one person
  • ofHours(8) means 1 typical working day for one person
  • ofHours(80) means 10 working days for one person, or 5 days for two people working in parallel

This class is immutable and stores only the raw workload quantity. Higher-level concepts such as resource allocation, effective duration, or calendar constraints are handled by NGMAllocation and LoadIntegrator.

See Also:
  • NGMAllocation
  • LoadIntegrator
